description: Endometrioid endometrial adenocarcinoma grade 2 measuring 3.4 x 2.9 cm with myometrial invasion of less than half the myometrium, negative cervical, parametrial, adnexal and lymph node involvement.
patient_notes: The pathology report shows a grade 2 cancer of the uterine lining that has not spread beyond the muscle wall and lymph nodes. The surgical removal was complete and your cancer is at an early stage. Your care team recommends follow-up treatment with vaginal radiation to reduce the risk of recurrence. We will monitor you closely with regular check-ups.

verification.assessment: FIGO and pathologic staging should be IA/pT1a due to <50% myometrial invasion.

figo_stage.issues: Tumor invades less than half of the myometrium, which corresponds to FIGO IA, not IB.

pathologic_stage.issues: Depth of invasion <50% myometrium implies pT1a, not pT1b.

change_explanations.figo_stage: Changed from 'IB' to 'IA'. Reason: Tumor invades less than half of the myometrium, which corresponds to FIGO IA, not IB.
change_explanations.pathologic_stage: Changed from 'pT1b pN0 pM0' to 'pT1a pN0 pM0'. Reason: Depth of invasion <50% myometrium implies pT1a, not pT1b.
